Sparse regression with paired covariates

Source: vignettes/vignette.Rmd
vignette.Rmd

The R package palasso implements the paired lasso.

library(devtools)
install_github("rauschenberger/palasso")
# install.packages("palasso")
library(palasso)
attach(toydata)
#library(glmnet)
#net <- glmnet(y=y,x=X[[1]])
object <- palasso(y=y,X=X)

similar methods (to glmnet and stats)

object
## palasso object: 30 samples, 2*50 covariates
weights(object)
fitted(object)
residuals(object)
predict(object,newdata=X)

Developed by Armin Rauschenberger.

Site built with pkgdown.
